title: When will the JP server be up?
body: So 2 days ago i think i look into the new blood moon article and say a writing saying that if you tranfser to JP server in March 1st you will get a blood moon Yasuo for free and the transfer has no cost and at all and today i was reading the article again to make sure that it is march the 1st and then later then i knew it says March 15 instead of March 1st so if anyone knows the exact date till the transfer is up please tell me.

replies.body:
Hey Mashing,

I see that you have some questions and I hope I can answer them for you; I've checked both the NA and JP articles that may have referred to this to use as resources to answer your question.

The JP Account Transfer article says they will start the Open Beta Test on March 1st (local time) while the NA Blood Moon article states that if you transfer to the Japan server by March 15 at 6:59 a.m. PST (23:59 p.m. JST), you get Blood Moon Yasuo for free; however, it doesn't state that the transfer itself is free.

Going back to the JP Account Transfer article, it says that players connecting from Japan will be able to transfer for free. (there are further details in the page which tells you who qualifies for it) It also notes that once you transfer to the Japan server, you will need to spend RP to transfer out if you choose to.

I hope that clears up any confusion!

NA Blood Moon article: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/blood-moon-calls

JP Account Transfer article: http://jp.leagueoflegends.com/ja/account_transfer

Wow thanks Golin. It was such a great help and thank you very much!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
